document.full_text: u.s. highway travel increased 0.2 percent in january from a year earlier, rising 500 million miles, the u.s. transportation department said on monday.
document.title: jan highway travel up 0.2 percent vs year ago: government
lines_and_colors: u.s. highway travel increased 0.2 percent in january from a year earlier, rising 500 million miles, the u.s. transportation department said on monday.
